OmniScript.description: Schools applying for this kind of Grant provides a list of Outcomes they want to achieve which generates Outcome Requirements and Tasks upon creation of the funding request

TextBlock3
childElements.propertySetConfig:
{ "controlWidth" : 12, "label" : "TextBlock3", "text" : "

Outline your goals with activities and expected outcomes that align with the purpose of this grant opportunity for the targeted population expected to benefit from the project. Consider all the activities and deliverables that align with the legislation. Make sure goals and activities are specific, measurable, attainable, relevant, and time bound (SMART). Provide estimated timelines.

childElements.propertySetConfig: { "controlWidth" : 1, "label" : ">>", "elementValueMap" : { "NarrativeResponse1" : "Here is an example of a Narrative Response. This is a long text field and you can add many details in this step to describe how the school will achieve the Outcomes they identify." }, "showPersistentComponent" : [ true, false ], "show" : null, "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "wpm" : false, "ssm" : false, "message" : { }, "pubsub" : false }

childElements.name: TextBlock2
childElements.propertySetConfig:
{ "controlWidth" : 12, "label" : "TextBlock2", "text" : "

Describe the need for this project and identify the targeted group who will benefit from the project goals and activities along with how the need was determined. Applicants must propose to further raise students' academic achievement by:

  • increasing the availability of and all students' access to advanced placement (AP) or international baccalaureate (IB) courses or programs;
  • expanding the breadth of advanced placement or international baccalaureate courses or programs that are available to students;
  • increasing the number and the diversity of the students who participate in advanced placement or international baccalaureate courses or programs and succeed;
  • providing low-income and other disadvantaged students with increased access to advanced placement or international baccalaureate courses and programs; or
  • increasing the number of high school students, including low-income and other disadvantaged students, who receive college credit by successfully completing advanced placement or international baccalaureate courses or programs and achieving satisfactory scores on related exams.

Include specific data that supports the stated need and how your program will be STEM focused. Include the following:

  • The target population
  • How the need was determined
  • Specific data supporting your stated need for the targeted population group identified and the need for STEM AP or IB programs
  • Grade levels targeted in the application
  • The population(s) that will benefit
  • Current barriers that exist for the targeted group
  • Other information that supports how the need was determined
", "show" : null, "dataJSON" : false, "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "textKey" : "", "sanitize" : false }
